text: @atrupar The South Korean COVID19 death rate is 0.6, which is based on a robust data set in a healthcare advanced nation.  Even 0.6 is likely too high based on significant under-reporting of cases.  Short version:  Trump is correct & medically you have no idea what you're talking about.
